bug.author: chenhuims
bug.summary: [BUG] Log directory in Dilated CNN example
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The log directory is not recognized in Windows. This prevents saving the logs to the directory and further training the model. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
